name: homogenization
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
food & drink
  specialized the process of treating milk so that the cream is mixed into other parts of the liquid: Pasteurization usually goes hand in hand with homogenization. Homogenization breaks down the fat in the milk.
usually disapproving the process of changing something so that all its parts or features become the same or very similar: They lamented the company's role in the homogenization of world culture. We're seeing the homogenization of fauna the world over. See
homogenize
More examplesFewer examplesEither pasteurization or homogenization destroys lactoferrin in the course of making milk safe for human consumption.The homogenization of American music is a sorry trend.He opposed the homogenization of culture under the pressure of mass marketing.
